verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> A <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G3364>like<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me.<s%> <S%G32>Someone<s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1453>"Rise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1544>Leave<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> the <S%G833>court<s%> which is <S%G2081>outside<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3354>measure<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> it has been <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G1484>nations.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They will tread the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> under <S%G3961>foot<s%> for <S%G5062>forty<s%> - <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> power <S%G1417>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they will <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> one <S%G5507>thousand<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> olive <S%G1636>trees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2316>Lord<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devours<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%> in this <S%G3779>way.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2808>shut<s%> up the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it may <S%G3361%G99999>not<s%> <S%G1026>rain<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G5204>waters,<s%> to <S%G4762>turn<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3960>strike<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4127>plague,<s%> as <S%G3740>often<s%> <S%G1437>as<s%> they <S%G2309>desire.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> they have <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3141>testimony,<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G305>comes<s%> up out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G12>abyss<s%> will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>Their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> will be <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G4113>street<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2257>their<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> From <S%G1537>among<s%> the <S%G2992>peoples,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5443>tribes,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1100>languages,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> people will <S%G991>look<s%> at <S%G846>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G863>allow<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> dead <S%G4430>bodies<s%> to be <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3418>tomb.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>Those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they will be <S%G2165>glad.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They will <S%G3992>give<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> to one <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> the <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2255>half<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> the <S%G4151>breath<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4228>feet.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G5602>here!<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> They went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>day<s%> <S%G1096>there<s%> was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G1182>tenth<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4098>fell.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2033>Seven<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> were <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1719>terrified,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1096>followed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> the Kingdom of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He will <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever!<s%>"

<S%G3004>saying:<s%> "We <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> the one who <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>was;<s%> <S%G2532%G99999><s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G936>reigned.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G3710>angry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> did the <S%G2540>time<s%> for the <S%G3498>dead<s%> to be <S%G2919>judged,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1401>bondservants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> their <S%G3408>reward,<s%> as well <S%G2532>as<s%> to the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> to the <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3173>great;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1311>destroy<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1311>destroy<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3485>temple<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of the <S%G846>Lord<s%>'s <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3485>temple.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G796>Lightnings,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5456>sounds,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1027>thunders,<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> <S%G1096>followed.<s%>
